etymologies: early 20th century (as beigel): from Yiddish beygel

definitions: a dense bread roll in the shape of a ring, made by boiling dough and then baking it

examples.text: I ate a toasted bagel with cream cheese

shortDefinitions: dense bread roll in shape of ring

definitions: a score of six games to love (6–0) in a set

examples.text: Del Potro avoided an embarrassing bagel but could not prevent Djokovic from stealing the set
her win over Cibulkova was the first double bagel in a WTA final since November 2006

shortDefinitions: score in set of six games to love
